items.sentence: I need to know everything there is to know about Tom.
I need to talk to Tom about what he said he would do.
Maybe it\'s about time I started learning to program.
Tom didn\'t realize he had his sweater on inside out.
Tom didn\'t want to tell Mary anything about himself.
Tom didn\'t want to think about that problem anymore.
I speak French to my father and English to my mother.
I took the dog for a walk even though it was raining.
Nobody noticed that the picture was hung upside down.
Three of my friends are going to Boston next weekend.
Three of my friends have gotten married to Canadians.
Tom advised Mary not to buy anything from that store.
Tom advised Mary not to go out after dark by herself.
Tom and Mary ate snails at the restaurant last night.
The police found Tom\'s fingerprints on the doorknob.
It was three weeks before she wrote an answer to Tom.
I haven\'t talked to Tom since he moved to Australia.
I hope that Tom doesn\'t tell Mary about what we did.
I should\'ve told Tom why he was supposed to do that.
I should\'ve warned you that Tom is a little strange.
